mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into address (address_id, address, contactName, phoneNumber, member_id, lng, lat) values (#{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lng, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lat, jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update address set member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contactName = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lng = #{lng, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, lat = #{lat, jdbcType=DOUBLE} where address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select address_id, member_id, address, contactName, phoneNumber, lng, lat from address
select address_id, member_id, address, contactName, phoneNumber, lng, lat from address where member_id = #{memberId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
